stimulusHtml: Under which of the following new conditions could the gravitational force on the object be neglected?

features.html: The figure above on the left represents the horizontal electric field near the center of two large, vertical parallel plates near Earth’s surface. The plates have height h and length ℓ, and they are separated by a distance w, as shown on the right. The field has magnitude E. A small object with mass m and charge +q, where m = qE/g, is released from rest at a point midway between the plates.

choicesHtml: q E ≫ m g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B0F@

E h ≫ E w MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AEE@
